attributes.action: look into a comment made by Graham Stringer, MP for Manchester Blackley about dylexic people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was appalled to see that an admired man could make a hurtful and downright lie of a comment about dyslexic people. As an a-level student achieving high grades I am obviously not illiterate and also wanting to join the police to fight crime, not to cause it. Please join if you feel the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
